messages.title: Am Newid Go Iawn / For Real Change
messages.content: Labour understands Welsh communities like ours need investment, not austerity. Investing in our communities is the key to their future success.

messages.title: We're backing Irwyn Cenog!
messages.content: Irwyn is a local, went to school here and understands rural communities. Join us in backing Irwyn Cenog for Brecon and Radnorshire.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Only Labour has a plan to kick-start the Green Industrial Revolution to tackle climate change and secure energy for the UK.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Free Internet for the Whole UK
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour intends to provide free broadband internet to everyone in the UK.
We will introduce community banks to operate across communities just like ours.
Labour promises to end austerity, pay workers a decent living wage out of the £10 an hour, and make government work for everyone.
The Tories have slashed funding for Wales. Only a Labour Government will give Wales the renewed investment it needs and deserves.

issues.environment: Labour has a plan to kick-start the Green Industrial Revolution to tackle climate change and secure energy for the UK.

housing.content: Investing in our communities is the key to their future success.

quotes.text: The Tories have caused years of suffering and needlessly harsh austerity. Only a Labour Government will deliver energy, justice, and hope.
Labour is the only party with a plan to tackle both climate change and poverty.

images.caption: Campaign leaflet images promoting the Labour party and Tom Davies.
